positions.title: Lead Developer
highlights: Sole developer after the CTO stepped back; owned the company’s entire tech stack
Designed and built an AI-powered coaching platform (backend, frontend, system, and database architecture)
Managed infrastructure and deployment (Azure, Vercel); integrated Stripe, Sendgrid, Semantic Kernel, and vector search
Implemented AI-driven features using Microsoft Semantic Kernel and Qdrant

positions.title: Junior Developer
highlights: Developed and maintained the company’s frontend application; collaborated with the CTO on backend and DevOps
Led UI/UX design and helped shape early product direction

positions.title: Junior Developer
highlights: Maintained and extended backend features for Krónan’s systems, working independently on fixes and small improvements.
Contributed to the new Elko webstore (Next.js, TypeScript, Django), focusing on frontend development in a cross-functional team; part of the team at launch.
Implemented backend database tasks and integrations supporting e-commerce functionality.
Worked on the N1 web app, adding features post-release, and contributed to N1 Rafmagn, launched during my time on the team.
Supported development of the N1 mobile app with additional functionality.
Collaborated with backend engineers, frontend devs, and product teams to deliver features across multiple subsidiaries.
